skillTree.localised_description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.
This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.
Few magics can worm their way through this one's skull; their Khornate collar offers adequate protection, as does the impenetrable, relentless fury infecting his mind.

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Crush the weak! Let their blood flow! KILL FOR KHORNE!

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: Where 'battle' is the question, 'violent rage' is undoubtedly the answer.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.
Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit (75)

skillTree.localised_description: The brand of the Blood God has been seared into the skin, a symbol of abject brutality.
What magic can penetrate the searing hatred within the minds of the Blood God's most brutal followers.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.
Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death (200)

skillTree.localised_description: When a huge swathe of rage and violence descends upon the unready, very few survivors are left in its wake.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
No mortal host shall hold them back.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates â€“ lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

skillTree.localised_description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

skillTree.localised_description: There is no other choice. There never was.
Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.localised_description: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption â€“ as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.
"This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

Daemonic units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is low.
	
	Daemonic units also have:
	Physical Resistance
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit is branded with the Mark of Khorne, and is affected by Khorne Authority.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!
The champion is surrounded by crackling flames that burn his enemies whilst leaving his own body untouched.
Fatigue is no issue when one is driven by the darkest rage imaginable.
Those blessed by Chaos see not only what is before them, but also what lurks in shadow, hiding in the periphery.
The champion has been rewarded with a hideous appearance, grotesque enough to wither the hearts of men.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Granted skin as strong as iron plate, there is little that can penetrate the champion's defences.
The champion's skin is covered with a thousand reptilian scales, each as tough as Dragonhide.
Some are blessed by a dark understanding, able to gleam knowledge from every experience.
A foe may strike fast, but those evolved by Chaos move faster still.
